an area of high open land: They went riding out along the ridge of the wold toward Burythorpe. I followed the road up onto the top of the wolds. Wold
used in the names of British places where there is an area of high open land: Stow on the Wold the Lincolnshire Wolds Beverley is a market town nestling in the Wolds of East Yorkshire.
